contact.workshop__сase: We will dive into your case
contact.workshop__training__program: Individual Simulator.Company training for teams and corporate clients
contact.workshop__description: This is the fastest way to get going with Simulator.Company. We are going to create an individualized educational program based on your needs. As a result, you will have a well-trained team and a working prototype of your business processes.
contact.card__description__control: Publish interactive maps to get map services from your own server or laptop.
contact.contactUs__description: We'd love to hear it! We are happy to answer any questions or suggestions, as well as to consider inquiries related to purchasing, invoicing, and cooperation.

by.questitonDescription: Frequently Asked Questions from our users
by.titleCardStateChanges: What is State Change and how to calculate them?
by.titleCard1: What is RPS (Requests per second) and how to calculate them?
by.titleCard2: What happens if I use up all the State Changes of my license?
by.titleCard3: Is support included in the license?
by.titleCard4: Do you provide a free license?
by.titleCard5: What is the difference between paid Cloud and In-House licenses?
by.titleCard7: Can I change the RPS for my license?
by.descriptionMainCardP1: A State Change takes place when a task moves from one node to another. A task passing through four nodes gets three State Changes. Total number of State Changes can be expressed as
by.descriptionMainCardListItem1: is the number of State Changes
by.descriptionMainCardListItem2: is the number of nodes in a Process.
by.descriptionMainCardListItem3: is the number of tasks received in a Process
by.descriptionMainCardP1ListItem1: Provides State Changes and RPS as specified in your pricing plan
by.descriptionMainCardP1ListItem2: Is used on the Simulator.Company domain
by.descriptionMainCardP1ListItem3: Doesn’t have an expiration date (you can pay for it monthly or yearly)
by.descriptionMainCardP2ListItem1: Provides RPS as specified in your pricing plan with State Changes not being priced or limited
by.descriptionMainCardP2ListItem2: Is used in a separate environment
by.descriptionMainCard5P3ListItem1: You can purchase and use multiple active In-House paid licenses.
by.descriptionCard1: Requests per second (RPS) represent the number of tasks that can be sent to a Process within 1 second. For example, if you’ve purchased the 10 RPS license and try to send 11 tasks per 1 second to a Process, the last task won’t be sent to the Process, and you will receive the PRS limit reached error.
by.descriptionCard2: After all State Changes of your license have been used up, your RPS equals 0 and you can’t send tasks to a Process until you replenish your State Changes account.
by.descriptionCard3: Yes, all our clients receive a basic support package free of charge. Other support packages can be purchased individually. For more information, please go to the Support page.
by.descriptionCard4: Yes, you can have a free Cloud license with RPS=2 for an unlimited period. When you register for the first time, you are given 1 million State Changes. When you run out of them, you will not be able to send tasks to Processes and will have the RPS=0 limit.
by.descriptionCard6: No, we do not have this option.
by.descriptionCard7: Yes, you can. To do this, purchase a new license and specify the needed RPS.
